plugins\/sms\/plugin_info\/configuration.Code pin (laisser vide s'il n'y en a pas: Pin code (leave blank if there is none)
plugins\/sms\/plugin_info\/configuration.A utiliser si vous ne recevez pas de mes: Use if you do not receive a message (compatibility with a maximum of modem) but remove support for multiple SMS and special characters
plugins\/sms\/plugin_info\/configuration.Passerelle SMS \/ SMS Gateway (en cas d': SMS Gateway / SMS Gateway (in case of error: CMS 330 SMSC number not set)
plugins\/sms\/plugin_info\/configuration.Utiliser le code #*#*4636#*#* sur un mob: Use the code # * # * 4636 # * # * on a mobile to find the SMSC of your operator

plugins\/sms\/desktop\/php\/sms.php.Aucun équipement SMS trouvé, cliquer sur: No SMS equipment found, click "Add" to start
plugins\/sms\/desktop\/php\/sms.php.Autorise la réception de messages de num: Allows receiving messages from unknown numbers. Interactions are always disabled for these numbers. The message received as well as the sender's number will be available via the commands as for any other message
plugins\/sms\/desktop\/php\/sms.php.Permet d'ajouter automatiquement un numé: Automatically add an unknown number to the command list when receiving a message
plugins\/sms\/desktop\/php\/sms.php.Cette option est dangereuse car cela va: This option is dangerous because it will automatically add a corresponding command to the number when receiving a message from an unknown number
plugins\/sms\/desktop\/php\/sms.php.Si sur le même équipement vous activez l: If on the same equipment you activate the interactions, it means that anyone can start interacting with your Jeedom
plugins\/sms\/desktop\/php\/sms.php.N'activez cette option que si vous êtes: Activate this option only if you are sure that you accept this risk

plugins\/sms\/core\/php\/jeeSMS.php.Vous n\\'etes pas autorisé à effectuer c: You are not authorized to perform this action
plugins\/sms\/core\/php\/jeeSMS.php.Message venant d\\'un numéro inconnu, cr: Message from an unknown number, auto creation enabled:
plugins\/sms\/core\/php\/jeeSMS.php.Message venant d\\'un numéro inconnu mai: Message from an unknown number but unknown numbers are allowed:

info.json.Plugin ajoutant la gestion (envoi\/récep: Plugin adding the management (sending / receiving) of SMS to Jeedom. With this plugin you can be notified by SMS, even ask a question or trigger an action via SMS thanks to the interaction engine. (Requires a 3G key and a SIM card)
